moves.10... c5 11. dxc5: 11. Rad1 Is slightly better. Then Re8 is about equal.
moves.12. Rfd1 e5: Slightly better than Re8 and Nc6.
moves.18. Nxe5: Bad because white is going to have to play f4 allowing black to play Qd7 and Qd4+.    18. Nh4 was best.
moves.18... Nxe5 19. f4 Qd7: The little tiny tactic that gets out of the pin.
moves.20. fxe5 Qd4+: Black doesn't have to take right away because of the weakness of the white king.
